title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 81: Tom Wilson, Wild Bill Karlsson, Playoff Update & More
description:
On this week's second edition of Stanley Cup Playoffs Chiclets, the boys talk about Thursday's Game 4 of Pens/Caps, Tom Wilson and his effect on the series, the highly entertaining San Jose/Vegas series, who should be fired in Columbus for letting Wild Bill Karlsson go, the Bruins bad start in Game 3 killing them, getting booed by an entire arena (home and away), and more. The guys also provide "live" updates on Nashville's big Game 4 win as well as discuss that series. Whits also addresses the sound issues and sound issue complaints, RA and Biz bitch about the horribly-named 'Like' feature on Twitter, and Biz gives his take on being called a "phony" by Dan Carcillo then dunking on him with receipts. Tune in.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
